website_summaries.verdict: For a set and rack that's compact, this CAP set is an excellent option.
pros: The weight rack is small and attractive, making it great for home gyms
Ergonomic cast iron handles make these weights easy to handle
Rubber coating prevents damage to floors and equipment
cons: The weights have a strong and unpleasant odor that should dissipate over time
Stand needs to be far enough from any walls to reach weights on all side

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is trash.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why this is not getting 5 stars is because I was given 4 nuts that have no thread. Therefore I am unable to complete the install of the rack. Will update if they send replacement hardware. I don’t know what everyone is complaining about the smell. It smells like gym equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I got them in time, the shipper was amazing that waited for me to get home, literally took me an hour so he was really generous. I now want a set that goes from 55-100. But this is great for my home gym. I was a little hesitant to purchase because of the reviews about them smelling bad, however, they smell like rubber - nothing terrible my floor mats are rubber just made my gym more like a gym. I would totally buy again, wish I purchased 5-100.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Compact barbell storage
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems a little low, but it seems perfectly steady and strong loaded up with the full 550lbs of weights. I needed a way to store a full barbell set in a small room with a bunch of other equipment and this let me do that. The stand doesn't rotate so be sure you can get to the fourth side. Otherwise, great option.
customer_reviews.author: clt808

customer_reviews.title: Great option for home workout
customer_reviews.text: Great product, creat value. I bought these to replace a set of Bowflex dumbbells and am glad I did. Grab and go. No more adjusting. Rack went together easy. Weights clean up easy. Rubber smell on mine not as bad as anticipated. They are kind of greasy, so be ready to windex them all off before you rack them the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Easy rack to set up, dumbells all arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great besides one thing. My 45 lb dumbells were either previously used or I just got some bad rubber. All the other weights were in perfect dark black condition, but the 45's were dirty/hazy. They do not look the same nice finish as the rest. Other than that, everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Land

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Have the rack right up against the wall and don’t have any of the issues others seem to have. Rack is sturdy but you have to really tighten the bolts hard. One of the 50lb dumbbells came a little dented from shipping but nothing major. Overall, I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Only comment I'd make is the stand is a bit flimsy but not a problem just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Love them but they smell so bad
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they smell so bad!!! We actually had to leave them outside for the first two weeks before we brought them in but they still smell horrible and the smell is so strong it will fill your entire home.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Quality dummbells
customer_reviews.text: A good quality set of dumbbells with rack included. These should last for years in our home gym. The only negative is that the set came missing one of the nuts for the bolts that were included and one of the holes was misdrilled. Fortunately my husband is handy and able to refill with the right bit and make it work!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of Dumbbells. The stand doesn't take much space, but as others have indicated, you need to be away from the wall to access the back weights. I put the ones I don;'t really use on that side. The smell on opening is pretty potent and lingers for a few weeks. I recommend setting it up in a garage at first, then once the smell has subsided, you can move inside the house
customer_reviews.author: James Murray

customer_reviews.title: Durable gym product, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dumbbell set I ever purchased, and it is my 4th set. These are by far great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much just like the picture. Neat and compact, and will be a nice help to maintain some muscle mass during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Rich

customer_reviews.title: Smells like...VICTORY!
customer_reviews.text: Great for home gym with limited space. A lot of folks worry with the smell - it goes away in a week or so. In the meantime it reminds you that you have an awesome gym, so better use it!
customer_reviews.author: Am Cuss Cousin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly, great set of weights
customer_reviews.text: Some said the weights have a rubber odor - this set did not, or was ever-so-slight. Really good set of weights for the home gym. Purchased the three-tiered rack, too. It is pretty steady considering it is holding 550 lbs and came flat in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good weight & rack set - would recommend
customer_reviews.text: No strong odor. Use them every day. Very happy with them and would def order again. Rack was easy to assemble by myself and is sturdy holding all the weights without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Missing weights
customer_reviews.text: Happy with product, but set was missing 2 15lb weights. Having trouble contacting seller to fix.
customer_reviews.author: DrWho

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbell set...
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this dumbbell set. Takes up very little space...
customer_reviews.author: Xtine85

customer_reviews.title: Great dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent for the price. The product does have the smell of rubber or tires but it decreases with time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set!!! Thank God I purchased last month when I did because it just went up over $700 in 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: SRL1978

customer_reviews.title: These weights are amazing! 😊 The stand is already built and the ...
customer_reviews.text: These weights are amazing! 😊 The stand is already built and the weights work perfect for us. Very happy with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Jess&Anthoney

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Rubber Hex Dumbbell Set, 550-Pound
feature_bullets: Set contains 5 to 50 pound dumbbells with 4 sided vertical dumbbell rack for easy storage
Great for both upper and lower body strength

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
